question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.


In your letter


give contact details for when you are away
give instructions about how to care for your pet
describe other household duties
Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.


Begin your letter as follows:
Dear .....................,
text: Hope you and your family doing amazing.This letter is written to you to thank you  that I would help me to take care of my house and pet while I am on holiday.

I will be going to Kota Kinabalu for five days to visit my uncle .My phone number will be 016-234-5678 just call me when anything happens.Because of the environment I am not sure that I can receive your call in time ,but I will call back when I saw it.

My dog called Kelly is a puppy having brown skin you just need to prepare dog food and water for her  .The dog food will be inside the cable beside the kitchen in a pink packet.Moreover ,you may help me to water the plant every day and bring Kelly out twice a day.
Thanks for your help if you need any more information just call me all the best.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Because of the environment. Consider adding a comma.
